text: wadhkr -ayha alrswl- hin baeathna 'ilyk, tayifat min aljini yastamieun mink alqran, falamaa hdru, warasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam yqra, qal bedhm lbed: anstu; lnstme alqran, falamaa frgh alrasul min tlawt alqran, waqad weawh waththar fyhm, rajaeuu 'iilaa qawmihim mundhirin wmhdhryn lahum bas allh, 'iin lam yuminuu bh
